summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to floating home moorages; establishing a floating home owner's right to purchase a moorage prior to sale to a third party, limiting moorage owner's right to alter the conditions of moorage occupancy, delcaring invalid permits and approvals issued in violation of Seattle Municipal Code 7.20; repealing Seattle Municipal Code 7.20.020, amending Seattle Municipal Code 7.20.040 and 130, and adding new sections to Seattle Municipal Code 7.20, and declaring an emergency.
